title: David Sacks, a member of the infamous “PayPal Mafia,” will lead a group of advisers tasked with steering AI and crypto policy under the Trump administration.
content: US president-elect Donald Trump has appointed venture capitalist and former PayPal executive David Sacks as White House AI & Crypto Czar. The appointment is being celebrated by crypto executives and policy wonks as "bullish" for the industry. In his announcement, Trump wrote that the two areas were “critical to the future of American competitiveness”
author: Joel Khalili, Makena Kelly
